name: Green Mission
description:
The world is under threat of a climate disaster! Build green energy sources while keeping the people in the city happy in this resource-management city building game.

Green Mission was made for the first term of the second year of CMGT, with the goal of making a game with a social message. The game was developed by team CIGA, where I was a 3D modeler and texture artist.

Designer - Kyon Kisters

Engineers - Niels de Gruijl, Freek Michielsen 

Artists - Dmitriy Budnitskiy, Kristiyan Mitov, Wouter van Ham
